00047 void dfsTestThreadFunction::operator()() {
00048   vector<const char *> args;
00049   int64_t origSize, dfsSize;
00050   CommandCopyFromLocal cmdCopyFromLocal(m_client);
00051   CommandCopyToLocal cmdCopyToLocal(m_client);
00052   CommandRemove cmdRemove(m_client);
00053 
00054   cmdCopyFromLocal.push_arg(m_input_file, "");
00055   cmdCopyFromLocal.push_arg(m_dfs_file, "");
00056   if (cmdCopyFromLocal.run() != 0)
00057     exit(1);
00058 
00059   cmdCopyToLocal.push_arg(m_dfs_file, "");
00060   cmdCopyToLocal.push_arg(m_output_file, "");
00061   if (cmdCopyToLocal.run() != 0)
00062     exit(1);
00063 
00064   // Determine original file size
00065   struct stat statbuf;
00066   if (stat(m_input_file.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00067     cerr << "Unable to stat file '" << m_input_file << "' - " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00068     exit(1);
00069   }
00070   origSize = statbuf.st_size;
00071 
00072   // Make sure file exists
00073   HT_EXPECT(m_client->exists(m_dfs_file), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00074 
00075   // Determine DFS file size
00076   dfsSize = m_client->length(m_dfs_file);
00077 
00078   if (origSize != dfsSize) {
00079     HT_ERRORF("Length mismatch: %ld != %ld", origSize, dfsSize);
00080     exit(1);
00081   }
00082 
00088 }
